jobDescription: Support all business departments, work on legacy applications, monitor application system efficiency, collaborate on software development and implementation of new tools and applications, perform quality assurance, coding, cloud computing, and contribute to digital transformation and innovation.
requiredSkills: Working on Desktop or Web application
Excellent interpersonal, communication and organizational skills
preferredQualifications: Bachelor's degree in engineering or similar or higher qualification
Knowledge of engineering applications like AutoCAD, Solid works, CATIA, Creo, MicroStation, Revit, S3D
Knowledge of at least one programming language (Python/Microsoft C#)
